title: Didn't receive password changer code!
body:
Hi !

I want to change my password, but i dont receive the code for it, please help me!

replies.body:
First, check your spam folder, maybe it's there. If not, write to the [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for help.

Please note, that this is the Hungarian forum. If you are not Hungarian, use the [international forums](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/)
Ha meg Magyar vagy, nyugodtan írj magyarul.
Azt hittem ez angol, csak valamiért nekem magyar lol
